text.section:
In this section:
"casino night" means a benefit performance at which:
a card game, wheel of chance, or roulette is played; and
money winnings or tokens redeemable in money are awarded as prizes; but
"casino night" does not include a benefit performance at which the only form of gaming is a wheel of fortune, big wheel, or other wheel of chance.

section.section: This subtitle and Subtitle 2 of this title do not authorize casino nights in the county.
A person may not conduct a casino night in the county.

text.section: A person who violates this section or a county ordinance enacted under this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 3 years or a fine not exceeding $5,000 or both.
